channel.title: Tips on devAny
channel.description: Recent content in Tips on devAny

item.title: How to use terminal
item.description: Open file easily Use peco. # in .bashrc or .bash_profile function pecodaf { devany -f $(find . -type f -o -path ./.git -prune | peco) } Use deavny command from the history with peco function pecodah { $(history | grep devany | cut -c 8- | peco) }
